Posts.Content: My cousin is taking chemo with Neulasta or something similar, along with Zometa or something similar to that.  (I don't know her exact treatment meds.)  The Neulasta (or similar) injection is what she said was causing a lot of pain.  Her doctor recommended Clariton D, and that has helped her - not completely, but it has helped.
Posts.Title: leg and knee pain during chemo
